fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

Interface Operation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOperation

    public interface Operation
    Represents an operation which can be invoked from a service.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this operation.
      List<OperationParameter> getParameters()
      Returns list of operation parameters.
      Service getService()
      Returns the service which defines this operation.
      Object invoke(Object... args)
      Invoke this operation with specified input arguments.
      void invoke(OperationParameter... args)
      Invoke this operation with specified arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this operation.
        Returns:
        the name of this operation.

      • getService

        Service getService()
        Returns the service which defines this operation.
        Returns:
        the service which defines this operation.

      • invoke

        Object invoke(Object... args)
        Invoke this operation with specified input arguments. In case of multiple output paremters, first output parameter (returned by getParameters method) will be returned.
        Parameters:
        args - input arguments

      • invoke

        void invoke(OperationParameter... args)
        Invoke this operation with specified arguments. Parameter order may not be important.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments

      • getParameters

        List<OperationParameter> getParameters()
        Returns list of operation parameters.
        Returns:
        list of operation parameters.
